backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Kare2U backend that defines product types (baby/adult, shampoo/conditioner/bodyWash/lotion/serum) and a static catalog of 9 products with prices, applying migrations on upgrade via MixinStorage.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that defines old and new actor state types (adding `serum` product type and replacing `priceRange` with a numeric `price`) and rebuilds the full 9-product catalog in the new schema.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the ProductCard and ProductCatalog frontend update feature to its relevant files, components, and test ID REQ-10.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference for the project's frontend architecture and component responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Base CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, chart, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Kare2U React app, mounting the app into a `#root` div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes all page sections (Header, Hero, BrandValues, ProductCatalog, WhyKare2U, BrandStory, Footer) and provides smooth-scroll and tab-switching handlers for navigation.
frontend/src/components/BrandStory.tsx: Two-column brand story section featuring a brand illustration with overlay quote badge, floating accent cards, and narrative text about Kare2U's eczema-inspired origins.
frontend/src/components/BrandValues.tsx: Renders a section displaying four brand value cards (Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Inspired, Natural Ingredients, Family-Safe) with icons, descriptions, and decorative leaf accents.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand logo, tagline, social media icon buttons, navigation links, and a product list, laid out in a three-column grid on larger screens.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed top navigation header with scroll-aware background blur, desktop nav links, a 'Shop Now' CTA button, and a collapsible mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Full-width hero section with a background image, decorative leaf motifs, brand logo, tagline, supporting copy, and 'Shop Baby' / 'Shop Adult' CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/LeafMotif.tsx: Exports a configurable SVG leaf decorative element (LeafMotif) and a composite LeafCluster component, both used as purely visual accents throughout the UI.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a single product as a card with its image (or emoji fallback), price badge, type label, name, description, and an 'Add to Cart' button.
frontend/src/components/ProductCatalog.t: Renders a tabbed product catalog section with 'baby' and 'adult' category tabs, displaying products in a responsive grid with loading skeletons and decorative leaf motifs.
frontend/src/components/WhyKare2U.tsx: Displays a 'Why Choose Us' section with three feature cards (eczema-focused formula, clean ingredients, all ages) using icons and styled with brand colors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via a React context hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching all products and products filtered by category from the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, configures Tailwind layers, and defines Kare2U brand CSS custom properties (colors, shadows, typography) for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with Kare2U brand colors (oklch), custom fonts, border radii, box shadows, and animation keyframes, plus typography and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the Kare2U project state including brand summary, color palette, product catalog with names/prices, architectural notes, and a list of existing implemented features for the eczema-focused skincare website.
